title: New Skechers x We Bare Bears Collection Releasing On 27 October
creator: A'bidah Zaid
description: Ah so adorable! The post New Skechers x We Bare Bears Collection Releasing On 27 October appeared first on Geek Culture.
content: Skechers is racking in collaborations after collaborations. After recently releasing a One Punch Man collection, Skechers is releasing a new one featuring Grizz, Ice and Pan from the adorable Cartoon Network series We Bare Bears. The Skechers x We Bare Bears Collection features six different unisex T-shirts for adults and two for kids. The collection comes in white, black, yellow, and green colours and is undeniably fun, versatile, and easy to wear. The T-shirts can also be paired up with skirts for adult women and shorts for kids. Starting 27 October 2021, fans can purchase the Skechers x We Bare Bears Collection at selected Skechers concept stores, as well as on Shopee and Lazada. content: Battlefield 2042‚Äòs Emma ‚ÄúSundance‚Äù Rosier is the first playable, non-binary specialist in the series. Following the reveal of Sundance, there have been questions from the community regarding the character‚Äôs gender identity, with one fan on Twitter asking whether or not Sundance is non-binary (thanks, GamingBible). From their biography on the official EA Dice website, it seems to suggest that the French specialist is non-binary and uses they/them pronouns. The Lead Community Manager at EA, Adam Freeman, also took to Twitter to confirm to fans that the character is in fact non-binary ‚Äì a first for the Battlefield series. Yep. Sundance is non-binary and uses the Pronouns They/Them. ‚Äî Freeman (@PartWelsh) October 21, 2021 Sundance, who was born in France, belongs to the assault class and utilises smart explosives as their speciality, from scatter grenades to micro-drones. They also can use a wingsuit, allowing them to traverse huge distances of the map when completing objectives. Meanwhile, following feedback from the Battlefield 2042 open beta, EA has revealed that it will make the game‚Äôs aim assist stronger. The publisher said in a blog post: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve also heard your feedback on Aim Assist strength on controllers. You helped to show us that it was too low, so we‚Äôve worked to improve this experience, making it more familiar to players who played with us in past titles‚Äù. In other news, the latest Apex Legends map is called Storm Point. The post ‚ÄòBattlefield 2042‚Äô will have the series first non-binary character appeared first on NME.

description: John Coplans, peintre, critique d'art¬†et commissaire d'expositions, s'est consacr√© les 20 derni√®res ann√©es de sa vie √† la photographie, sur un sujet unique, son propre corps.¬†√Ä d√©couvrir √† la Fondation Henri Cartier-Bresson √† Paris jusqu'au 16 janvier 2022.
full_description: L'artiste britannique John Coplans a entrepris √† 60 ans un travail photographique formel remarquable autour de son corps. La Fondation Henri Cartier-Bresson lui consacre sa premi√®re exposition d'envergure en Europe depuis sa mort en 2003. Quand John Coplans commence √† faire des photographies, au d√©but des ann√©es 1980, il a d√©j√† trois vies derri√®re lui. N√© √† Londres en 1920, il s'engage √† 17 ans dans l'arm√©e britannique pour combattre le fascisme. Quand il la quitte en 1945, il √©tudie l'art √† Paris et √† Londres et devient peintre, part pour les √âtats-Unis, expose. Puis, √† partir de 1961, il est critique d'art, commissaire d'exposition, directeur de mus√©e. Il cofonde la tr√®s importante revue Artforum . John Coplans, Torso Front, 1984 (¬© The John Coplans Trust) Une figure connue du monde de l'art contemporain En 1980, John Coplans est d√©j√† une figure connue du monde de l'art contemporain. "Il avait fait des expositions tr√®s importantes des artistes majeurs des ann√©es 1960, il a √©t√© un des acteurs de la diffusion du pop art et du minimalisme, il a expos√© tr√®s t√¥t Warhol, Lichtenstein, Richard Serra, Donald Judd", souligne Jean-Fran√ßois Chevrier, commissaire de l'exposition. Par ailleurs, "il a beaucoup fait pour que la photographie soit reconnue comme un art √† part enti√®re". Et pourtant, alors, il n'est pas photographe. Il se forme pendant quatre ans, commence par faire des portraits, puis il se dit que son propre corps est un sujet int√©ressant. Son corps nu, et en noir et blanc. Toutes les ≈ìuvres de l'exposition sont issues des collections fran√ßaises, qui se sont int√©ress√©es tr√®s t√¥t au travail de John Coplans. John Coplans, "Back with Arms Above", 1984 (¬© The John Coplans Trust) Le dessin √† l'origine des images Deux petits poings serr√©s surgissent au-dessus d'un large dos. Un dos file vers l'arri√®re-plan, laissant le haut d'une cuisse et des fesses au premier plan. Des mains pos√©es sur des genoux dessinent de dr√¥les de silhouettes. Apr√®s avoir vu √† Paris les petites oeuvres bricol√©es par Picasso, il r√©alise une tr√®s belle s√©rie de mains auxquelles il pr√™te mille expressions. Deux mains qui tiennent des pieds dessinent une nature morte √©trange, d'autres images √©voquent des sculptures. Certaines sont dr√¥les, po√©tiques, parfois d√©rangeantes. "John Coplans pensait la photographie en rapport avec le dessin, ce sont des images dessin√©es avant d'√™tre photographi√©es" , fait remarquer Jean-Fran√ßois Chevrier. "Je me parcours, je m'int√©resse √† la frontalit√©, au format, √† l'√©chelle, aux tensions avec les bords, au dessin - avec l'id√©e qu'on peut dessiner avec l'appareil photo" , disait l'artiste. John Coplans, Front Hand, Thumb Up, Middle, 1988 (¬© The John Coplans Trust) Un corps universel Bien que l'unique sujet soit son corps, le corps d'un homme de 60 ans, "il n'y a aucune donn√©e biographique dans ses images" , souligne le commissaire, qui parle de "corps universel" au service de "la vie des formes" . D'ailleurs, John Coplans, qui se photographie sur un fond neutre blanc, prend toujours le soin de laisser sa t√™te hors cadre, "pour supprimer toute r√©f√©rence √† mon identit√© actuelle" , √©crit l'artiste. Devant des pouces ouverts qui plissent la peau des genoux, Jean-Fran√ßois Chevrier voit une image de Karl Blossfeldt (photographe allemand qui a fait des images de plantes fantastiques). Dans une image de pieds, il voit une "√©l√©vation". "Ce qui est extraordinaire, c'est que ce rapprochement ne d√©range pas du tout la perception de l'image. √áa ajoute une couche de m√©taphore mais √ßa n'emp√™che pas de voir ce geste extraordinaire de la main qui plisse le genou" , dit le commissaire, qui souligne la connaissance de l'histoire de l'art "exceptionnelle" qu'avait l'artiste. John Coplans, "Body Parts", No. 8, 2001 (¬© The John Coplans Trust) Fragmentation Apr√®s des petits formats, John Coplans a exp√©riment√© le grand format. Et puis il a fragment√© le corps, espa√ßant les fragments avec des bandes blanches mais gardant une unit√© de forme. Juste avant sa mort, il a r√©alis√© une derni√®re s√©rie, Body Parts , imagin√©e apr√®s les attentats du 11 Septembre 2001. Il y assemble des parties du corps disjointes, cr√©ant un effet de trouble qui peut √™tre violent. Elle est quasiment absente des collections fran√ßaises et une seule ≈ìuvre la repr√©sente dans l'exposition. John Coplans, la vie des formes Fondation Henri Cartier-Bresson 79, rue des Archives, 75003 Paris Tous les jours sauf lundi, 11h-19h Tarifs : 9 ‚Ç¨ / 5 ‚Ç¨ Du 5 octobre 2021 au 16 janvier 2022

title: Denuvo was reportedly slowing down ‚ÄòShadow Of The Tomb Raider‚Äô
creator: Andy Brown
description: Shadow Of The Tomb Raider managed to achieve an extra 30fps without Denuvo The post Denuvo was reportedly slowing down ‚ÄòShadow Of The Tomb Raider‚Äô appeared first on NME.
content: Recent reports allege that Shadow Of The Tomb Raider has received a notable increase in performance since Denuvo anti-piracy DRM was removed. READ MORE: ‚ÄòThe Dark Pictures Anthology: House of Ashes‚Äô review: a dark descent to the series‚Äô peak After Square Enix removed Denuvo from the two most recent Tomb Raider games, DSOG has reported that Shadow Of The Tomb Raider runs much better without the controversial software. During benchmark tests ran across versions of the game with and without Denuvo, DSOG found that on the highest settings there were small improvements in performance without Denuvo. However, running the game on the lowest settings ‚Äì again, on both versions ‚Äì resulted in a larger improvement of 17fps in average framerates for the Denuvo-free copy. Once Hyper-Threading (a CPU feature that allows games to execute multiple tasks at once) was disabled, the copy of Shadow Of The Tomb Raider with Denuvo enabled was slower than the Denuvo-free version by an entire 30fps. Shadow Of The Tomb Raider. Credit: Square Enix Denuvo is unpopular among PC gamers, as there have been frequent reports that the anti-piracy software is to blame for dragging down performance in PC games. Earlier in the year, hackers alleged that Denuvo ‚Äì in combination with Capcom‚Äòs own DRM ‚Äì was the cause for major stuttering issues in Resident Evil Village. This proved true ‚Äì as a result, Capcom quickly released a patch that was meant to optimise the DRM software to have less of an impact. This month, a slew of games ‚Äì several from Square Enix alone ‚Äì have removed Denuvo. Last week (October 18), new documentation provided by Intel suggested that its next generation of Adler Lake CPU‚Äôs may have compatibility issues with DRM software. In other news, Mario Party Superstars will add a health warning to the notorious Tug o‚Äô War minigame, after it caused a slew of injuries between 1999-2000. When the minigame was originally released on the Nintendo 64, many reported receiving blisters and burns while playing the game. The post Denuvo was reportedly slowing down ‚ÄòShadow Of The Tomb Raider‚Äô appeared first on NME.

title: Br√©sil : YouTube suspend la cha√Æne de Jair Bolsonaro pendant une semaine
description: La plateforme vid√©o YouTube a suspendu lundi pour une semaine les activit√©s de la cha√Æne de Jair¬†Bolsonaro, apr√®s avoir retir√© une vid√©o dans laquelle il mentionnait de fausses informations associant le vaccin anti-coronavirus au sida. Le compte du pr√©sident br√©silien est bloqu√© pour une semaine.
full_description: Louise Bernard, √©dit√© par Sol√®ne Leroux avec AFP 10h45, le 26 octobre 2021 La plateforme vid√©o YouTube a suspendu lundi pour une semaine les activit√©s de la cha√Æne de Jair Bolsonaro, apr√®s avoir retir√© une vid√©o dans laquelle il mentionnait de fausses informations associant le vaccin anti-coronavirus au sida. Le compte du pr√©sident br√©silien est bloqu√© pour une semaine. C'est la deuxi√®me fois que le pr√©sident Jair Bolsonaro enfreint les "normes de la communaut√©" de la plateforme. Cette fois, c'est pour cause de d√©sinformation m√©dicale. Dans une vid√©o en direct jeudi dernier, il avait mentionn√© l‚Äôexistence d‚Äôun soi-disant lien entre les vaccins contre le Covid-19 et le d√©veloppement du sida. Selon lui, ce lien √©tait √©tabli dans des rapports officiels du gouvernement britannique. Ce dernier a d√©menti cat√©goriquement, tout comme des scientifiques. Une vid√©o supprim√©e par Facebook et Instagram La vid√©o a donc √©t√© supprim√©e par YouTube et la plateforme a d√©cid√© d‚Äôaller plus loin, conform√©ment √† son r√®glement. "Nous avons supprim√© une vid√©o de la cha√Æne de Jair Bolsonaro pour violation de nos politiques de d√©sinformation m√©dicale sur le Covid-19 en affirmant que les vaccins ne r√©duisent pas le risque de contracter la maladie et qu'ils provoquent d'autres maladies infectieuses", a indiqu√© YouTube √† l'AFP. Les r√©seaux sociaux Facebook et Instagram, qui appartiennent au m√™me groupe, ont supprim√© la vid√©o lundi pour la m√™me raison. Comme c‚Äôest la deuxi√®me fois que le pr√©sident br√©silien enfreint les r√®gles de la plateforme, son compte est suspendu pour les sept prochains jours. Ses vid√©os d√©j√† en ligne resteront accessibles pour le public, mais Jair Bolsonaro ne pourra ni en publier de nouvelles, ni faire d'√©missions en direct. Le pr√©sident compte 3,5 millions d'abonn√©s sur Youtube.

title: Gases contaminantes rompen r√©cord; rumbo a la COP26
creator: citlallin.andrade
description: Ver√≥nica Mondrag√≥nCIUDAD DE M√âXICO. La cantidad de gases contaminantes se encuentra en niveles r√©cord, denunci√≥ la Organizaci√≥n Meteorol√≥gica Mundial (OMM) ayer. En 2020, los niveles de di√≥xido de carbono (CO2), el m√°s abundante de los gases de efecto invernadero, alcanz√≥ las 413.2 partes por mill√≥n (ppm) y se sit√∫a en 149% de los niveles preindustriales. Es decir, previo al a√±o 1750, que representa el momento en que la actividad humana empez√≥ a alterar el equilibrio natural de la Tierra. ‚ÄúSi se mantiene el actual ritmo de aumento de las concentraciones de gases de efecto invernadero, el incremento de la temperatura a finales de este siglo superar√° de lejos el objetivo establecido en virtud del Acuerdo de Par√≠s de limitar el calentamiento global a 1.5 o dos grados cent√≠grados por encima de los niveles preindustriales‚Äù, afirm√≥ el secretario general de la OMM, el profesor Petteri Taalas. El di√≥xido de carbono contribuye un 66% al calentamiento del clima, principalmente por causa de la quema de combustibles f√≥siles y la producci√≥n de cemento. En cuanto al metano (CH4), la concentraci√≥n aument√≥ 262% y el √≥xido nitroso (N2O) se increment√≥ en 123 % de los niveles preindustriales. El calentamiento del planeta, sumado a la presencia de estos gases, acelerar√° la presencia de fen√≥menos extremos, calor, tormentas, deshielo y aumento del nivel del mar, afirm√≥ la OMM. En tanto, a mayor sequ√≠a, incendios forestales y fen√≥menos extremos, es m√°s dif√≠cil que los ecosistemas absorban di√≥xido de carbono, agreg√≥ el reporte. ‚ÄúEstamos muy lejos del camino marcado‚Äù, insisti√≥, de cara a la Conferencia de las Naciones Unidas sobre el Cambio Clim√°tico (COP26), que comienza el pr√≥ximo domingo en Glasgow, Escocia. ‚ÄúEsto no es una mera f√≥rmula qu√≠mica y unas cuantas cifras en un gr√°fico. Conlleva repercusiones negativas de primer orden para nuestra vida cotidiana y nuestro bienestar, para el estado de nuestro planeta y para el futuro de nuestros hijos y nietos, afirm√≥ Petteri Taalas. T√≥xicos El di√≥xido de carbono es el gas de efecto invernadero m√°s abundante en la atm√≥sfera. Contribuye en un 66 % al efecto de calentamiento del clima. El metano permanece en la atm√≥sfera durante aproximadamente una d√©cada. Causa 16 % del efecto de calentamiento. El √≥xido nitroso debilita la capa de ozono. full_description: Compelling narratives have always been Drishyam Films‚Äô strongest suit. Whether it is Aankhon Dekhi, Masaan, Dhanak, Kaamyaab or Newton, Drishyam Films stories have always made a strong impact on the audience. Repeating history yet again, Drishyam Films‚Äô upcoming anthology Tryst With Destiny is set to enthral fans, starting November 5th on Sony LIV. In fact, the trailer of the film has already created quite a stir amongst netizens and cinephiles alike! On Friday, Sony LIV released the trailer of Tryst With Destiny and ever since, the worldwide web has been abuzz with conversations around the internationally acclaimed mini-series. Here are some of the posts that have been trending on social media channels: ‚ÄúA film I have been waiting for a long time‚Ä¶. #TrystWithDestiny by a production house that never disappoints us‚Ä¶ awesome starcast‚Ä¶ trailer looks great‚Ä¶ carry on @manmundra sir, @drishyamfilms‚Äù (sic) ‚ÄúIntriguing #TrystWithDestiny‚Ä¶ all stellar performers‚Ä¶ you had me at ‚Äòexcept one thing‚Ä¶ the colour of your skin‚Äô‚Äù (sic) ‚ÄúThis is what you can say a promising trailer & once again the actors are picked up who are one of the finest in acting skills. @AshishVid @vineetkumar_s @jaideepahlawat all three are brilliant. Gud Luck @drishyamfilms for #TrystWithDestiny. @ManMundra is back again wth a bang‚Äù (sic) If the response to the trailer is anything to go by, it looks like the critically-acclaimed anthology is set to win the hearts of the audience too! Tryst With Destiny deep dives into real-world social issues and was the only Indian film to be a part of the Tribeca Film Festival 2020. Internationally recognized and lauded by critics, it went on to win Best Screen Play at the renowned film festival. Directed by Prashant Nair, the award-winning mini-series stars stellar performers including Ashish Vidyarthi, Suhasini Mani Ratnam, Ishwak Singh, Lillete Dubey, Victor Banerjee, Vineet Kumar Singh, Kani Kusruti, Jaideep Ahlawat, Palomi Ghosh, Amit Sial and Geetanjali Thapa. The anthology has been penned by Prashant Nair, Neeraj Pandey and Avani Deshpande.

content: Organis√©e par Juin Jardins, elle se d√©roulera du 1er au 30 novembre. Du 1er au 30 novembre, elle accueille l‚Äôartiste peintre et plasticien Bastien Lema√Ætre qui pr√©sentera toiles et dessins ainsi qu‚Äôune installation sensitive et immersive, autour de l‚Äôarbre, la for√™t et la lumi√®re. Contemplatif et passionn√© par l‚Äôespace qui nous entoure, m√™me √† des ann√©es-lumi√®re, Bastien Lema√Ætre poursuit une recherche et une d√©marche artistique soucieuses du monde √† venir, de la nature et du vivant, accordant peu de place √† l‚Äôhumain, sinon les traces de son impact sur le paysage. Artiste prot√©iforme et autodidacte, Bastien Lema√Ætre propose au Chai un ensemble de toiles repr√©sentant la nature, plus particuli√®rement la for√™t et l‚Äôarbre, observ√©s au fil de ses promenades dans le Lot, aux heures de sorties autoris√©es pendant les confinements. Il est question de formes, de volumes et de lumi√®res. Il est question du temps, de la dur√©e, de l‚Äôimmersion. Sa pratique picturale s‚Äôapparente √† la peinture hyperr√©aliste, empruntant la lumi√®re aux impressionnistes, le clair-obscur aux peintres r√©alistes am√©ricains et le r√©alisme magique aux surr√©alistes. Par sa peinture, Bastien Lema√Ætre chemine du r√©el au sur r√©el en travaillant la lumi√®re et les lueurs selon l‚Äôheure du jour et la saison. Ses for√™ts semblent habit√©es et c‚Äôest l‚Äôinvisible que l‚Äôon devine. Arbres et √©l√©ments de la nature d√©gagent une force et une √©nergie soutenues. Peu importe les r√©f√©rences, peu importe la technique, la toile ou le papier, l‚Äôhuile ou l‚Äôacrylique, il extrait la lumi√®re de son sujet pour mieux le transcender. Le propos simple en apparence r√©v√®le sa complexit√© par cette lumi√®re si sp√©cifique qui transforme la r√©alit√© et l‚Äôenchante. Le point de vue de l‚Äôartiste est inattendu, d√©cal√©, parfois perturbant et trouble le regardeur. La nature devient alors √©trange. Face √† la toile, il faut trouver la bonne distance. Trop loin, la lumi√®re s‚Äôestompe, trop pr√™t le d√©tail r√©v√®le la technique et la magie s‚Äôestompe. Depuis maintenant quelques ann√©es, Bastien Lema√Ætre d√©veloppe √©galement une cr√©ation proche de l‚Äôart in situ, √† partir de mat√©riaux locaux et naturels. Dans le cadre du projet d‚Äôexp√©rimentation culturelle Faire art de tout bois, men√© avec le Parc naturel r√©gional des Causses du Quercy en 2019, il propose de cr√©er avec les habitants du village de Belfort-du-Quercy, un ¬´ arbre monde ¬ª dont les racines et les branches en bois flott√© s‚Äô√©tirent et se transforment en objet manufactur√© du patrimoine. L‚Äôeffet est saisissant et √©voquent les usages que l‚Äôon fait de la nature, du bois, en bien ou en mal. Bastien Lema√Ætre accompagne son exposition d‚Äôune installation en bois local o√π il est question de rappeler le cycle de la vie. > ¬´ Vers les lueurs ¬ª du 1er au 30 novembre, de 15 h 30 √† 20 h 30 en semaine et de 15 h √† 19 h les week-ends. > Autour de l‚Äôexposition ‚Äì Vendredi 5 novembre au Chai √† partir de 18h30 : Inauguration de l‚Äôexposition Vers les lueurs de Bastien Lema√Ætre, suivie √† partir de 19h de la performance Oser croquer le Paysage de l‚Äôartiste Maeva Barri√®re > projet de sensibilisation √† la sant√© environnementale autour d‚Äôune oeuvre participative et d√©gustative port√© par le PETR Grand Quercy, dans le cadre du Programme R√©gional de Sant√© Environnementale (PRSE3) et l‚Äôassociation Juin Jardins. ‚Äì Samedi 6 novembre √† 17 h 30 au Chai (sur inscription √† cahorsjuinjardins@hotmail.fr) : Yoga Sankara et m√©ditation autour de l‚Äôarbre et la for√™t ‚Äì Jeudi 11 novembre √† 18 h 30, cin√©ma Le Grand Palais, soir√©e cin√©ma : ¬´ La graine, les particules et la lune ¬ª, de Dune Dupuy, dans le cadre des Jeudis de Cin√© + ‚Äì Mercredi 17 novembre √† 15 h au Chai, Atelier dessin terre & bois, men√© par Bastien Lema√Ætre. Limit√© √† 15 personnes √† partir de 8 ans (sur inscription √† cahorsjuinjardins@hotmail.fr) ‚Äì Mercredi 17 novembre √† 20h30 au Chai (salle de conf√©rence), conf√©rence : ¬´ Regards sur la for√™t lotoise, du peintre au forestier ¬ª, en partenariat avec le PETR du Grand Quercy et l‚Äôassociation Coeur de for√™t. > Pour toutes les actions pr√©vues, pass sanitaire n√©cessaire

title: Adele announces two huge shows at London‚Äôs Hyde Park in 2022
creator: Damian Jones
description: It comes after 'Easy On Me' shot to the top of the UK singles chart The post Adele announces two huge shows at London‚Äôs Hyde Park in 2022 appeared first on NME.
content: Adele has announced two huge shows at London‚Äôs Hyde Park next summer. READ MORE: Adele‚Äôs voice has never sounded better than on her stunning new song ‚ÄòEasy On Me‚Äô The singer is set to perform on July 1 and 2 for her first shows in the UK since 2017. ‚ÄúOiii Oiiiiiiiii,‚Äù Adele wrote on Instagram announcing the dates. Fans can sign up here from 8am today (October 26) to access Adele‚Äôs pre-sale which begins at 10am on Thursday (October 28). American Express Cardmembers can also access pre-sale tickets from 10am on Friday (October 29). Tickets go general sale on 10am on Saturday (October 30) and can be purchased here. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Adele (@adele) Her dates come after the singer shot straight to Number One in the UK singles chart after ‚ÄòEasy On Me‚Äò clocked up a massive 217,300 chart sales in its first week ‚Äì the highest week one figure since Ed Sheeran‚Äôs ‚ÄòShape Of You‚Äô, earned 226,800 back in January 2017. Adele also broke another chart record with the track racking up 24million streams in the UK topping Ariana Grande‚Äôs record of 16.9million set back in January 2019 with ‚Äò7 Rings‚Äô. ‚ÄòEasy On Me‚Äô, her first single in five years, also earned the biggest week of digital download sales of 2021 so far, with 23,500. Reviewing ‚ÄòEasy On Me‚Äô, NME wrote: ‚ÄúFor now, though, Adele has returned with a reassuring slice of classic Adele balladry. This song will chime with anyone going through a quarter-life crisis, a mid-life crisis, or just a crisis of a hangover. And if you look to Adele‚Äôs music to make you cry, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.‚Äù Her fourth album, ‚Äô30‚Äô, is set to arrive on November 19. title: Tom Holland Says 'Spider-Man: No Way Home' Features One of His "Coolest Scenes Ever"
description: In a recent interview with Empire, Tom Holland revealed details regarding the upcoming Spider-Man: No Way Home film.While Marvel Studios has been known to keep many of its details under wraps, Holland was able to give fans a small glimpse of what was his favorite scene to film as the titular Peter Parker. The scene in discussion sees Peter Parker, Aunt May and Happy Hogan with a mystery fourth character sitting together having a discussion about what it is like to be a superhero. Holland says, "It's four people sitting at a table, having a conversation about what it's like to be a superhero and it was amazing." He also adds, "The other day we watched the scene, my brother and I, and our jaws were on the floor."While Holland has famously blabbed about certain spoilers, this time the actor is holding his cards closer to his chest, doubling down on being "in the dark." Fans are now speculating if the mystery fourth chair might hint at a long-rumored crossover between Holland's Spider-Man and the ones played by Andrew Garfield or Tobey Maguire. Though Holland has said in the past that his two predecessors are not expected to make a return to the big screen, fans have also speculated that perhaps there might be another Avenger joining the discussion.Spider-Man: No Way Home hits theaters on December 17.In other entertainment news, Brendan Fraser has joined the cast of Batgirl as Firefly villain.Click here to view full gallery at HYPEBEAST

full_description: In a recent interview with Empire , Tom Holland revealed details regarding the upcoming Spider-Man: No Way Home film. While Marvel Studios has been known to keep many of its details under wraps, Holland was able to give fans a small glimpse of what was his favorite scene to film as the titular Peter Parker. The scene in discussion sees Peter Parker, Aunt May and Happy Hogan with a mystery fourth character sitting together having a discussion about what it is like to be a superhero. Holland says, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs four people sitting at a table, having a conversation about what it‚Äôs like to be a superhero and it was amazing.‚Äù He also adds, ‚ÄúThe other day we watched the scene, my brother and I, and our jaws were on the floor.‚Äù While Holland has famously blabbed about certain spoilers, this time the actor is holding his cards closer to his chest, doubling down on being ‚Äúin the dark.‚Äù Fans are now speculating if the mystery fourth chair might hint at a long-rumored crossover between Holland‚Äôs Spider-Man and the ones played by Andrew Garfield or Tobey Maguire . Though Holland has said in the past that his two predecessors are not expected to make a return to the big screen, fans have also speculated that perhaps there might be another Avenger joining the discussion. Spider-Man: No Way Home hits theaters on December 17. In other entertainment news, Brendan Fraser has joined the cast of Batgirl as Firefly villain .

title: Viola INE principios democr√°ticos en revocaci√≥n de mandato
creator: citlallin.andrade
description: Por Lucy Meza El Instituto Nacional Electoral (INE) viola los principios rectores de la funci√≥n electoral y de la democracia en el proceso de revocaci√≥n de mandato. Estos principios, por cierto, constituyen el marco √©tico que permiten evaluar el desempe√±o de los consejeros y funcionarios electorales. Para que en nuestro pa√≠s se pueda realizar la consulta popular de revocaci√≥n de mandato se requiere el respaldo de 3% de los integrantes de la lista nominal de electores a nivel nacional. Sin este requisito indispensable, simplemente no habr√≠a consulta ciudadana. Antes de que el Congreso de la Uni√≥n expidiera la Ley General de Revocaci√≥n de Mandato, los consejeros del INE emitieron una serie de lineamientos para desarrollar el proceso, con base a una deliberada interpretaci√≥n realizada a las reformas del art√≠culo 35 de la Constituci√≥n Pol√≠tica de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos. Esto, a pesar de que nuestro sistema de control entre poderes es la Suprema Corte de Justicia de la Naci√≥n, la √∫nica facultada para emitir interpretaciones constitucionales. No obstante, los lineamientos ilegales del INE violan los principios rectores electorales de certeza, legalidad, independencia, imparcialidad y objetividad. Estas violaciones por parte de los consejeros electorales tienen como √∫nico objetivo el retrasar el desarrollo del proceso y llevar al fracaso la revocaci√≥n de mandato. Los lineamientos del INE son parciales porque fueron emitidos por este grupo de consejeros, quienes se atribuyeron facultades que, constitucionalmente, no est√°n dentro de su esfera de competencia, y lo hicieron bajo intereses poco claros. Carecen de certeza porque no garantizan la participaci√≥n ni el desarrollo de la consulta ciudadana, al excluir a ciudadanos de 586 municipios, considerados de alta marginalidad, en el uso de formatos de papel para la recopilaci√≥n de las firmas que permitan cumplir con el requisito del 3 por ciento. S√≥lo contemplaron para esos fines a 204 municipios, calificados como de muy alta marginalidad. En estos 790 municipios no se tiene una cobertura de internet y, en consecuencia, la utilizaci√≥n de una app m√≥vil podr√≠a ser inutilizable para el prop√≥sito de recabar firmas. La √∫nica forma de garantizar el apoyo ciudadano ser√≠a con formatos de papel. No cumplen con la objetividad, porque la determinaci√≥n de los consejeros electorales fue preponderar el uso de la app m√≥vil al uso de los formatos de papel. Los consejeros ignoran que hasta en las ciudades sin marginalidad, existen zonas donde no hay cobertura de internet o donde las telefon√≠as m√≥viles no tienen la suficiente cobertura. Es decir, carecen de se√±al. No hay independencia en los actos de los consejeros del INE porque es evidente que, con esos lineamientos, actuaron en obediencia a los intereses pol√≠ticos de quienes los eligieron para ejercer el cargo. Por lo tanto, los consejeros electorales s√≠ violan el marco √©tico y democr√°tico de referencia institucional, que permite orientar su comportamiento y su conducta en el desempe√±o de su cargo y funciones. title: Global Box Office Projected To Reach $22B In 2021 After Powerful October: Analysts
creator: Nancy Tartaglione
description: In mid-September, Gower Street Analytics projected global box office for 2021 would come in at $20.2B. The London-based film tech company has now increased its estimate to $21.6B, with the possibility of hitting a nice round $22B. The reason for the shift is primarily driven by the strong performance of October titles including China‚Äôs The [‚Ä¶]
full_description: In mid-September, Gower Street Analytics projected global box office for 2021 would come in at $20.2B. The London-based film tech company has now increased its estimate to $21.6B , with the possibility of hitting a nice round $22B. The reason for the shift is primarily driven by the strong performance of October titles including China‚Äôs The Battle At Lake Changjin ($830M through this past Sunday ), MGM/Eon/Universal‚Äôs No Time To Die ($525.2M) and Sony‚Äôs Venom: Let There Be Carnage ($352.4M). Warner Bros/Legendary‚Äôs Dune is also coming out of a strong, expanded release frame with a global total of $223.2M per Monday actuals. Gower Street now sees worldwide ticket sales for the year repping an 80% increase on 2021 (compared with its earlier estimate of +68%). While off 49% from 2019‚Äôs banner pre-Covid year, 2021 has narrowed the gap from a previous projection of -52%, the firm says. Related Story Oscars: Norway Submits Joachim Trier's 'The Worst Person In The World' To International Feature Race MGM An estimate of $3.2B for the month of October would land its business just 4% behind the average of the three pre-pandemic years (2017-2019). No previous month in 2021 has performed better than 40% behind the three-year average, per Gower Street. There have been clear gains in Asia Pacific, with the 2021 regional share expected to reach 52.2% (up from just over 50%). This is down to China, while other key APAC markets have seen a reduced market share of worldwide box office, notably including Korea which has been soft of late and Australia which is slowly coming out of lockdown. China is expected to represent nearly 34% of the global box office in 2021, compared to 28% in 2020. The EMEA region is seen dropping from 23.1% to 21.6%. The latter figure is on par with Gower Street‚Äôs domestic projection for 2021. Latin America would rep 4.6% of the global total, the firm says. Major titles still to release this year include Disney/Marvel‚Äôs Eternals , Sony/Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man: No Way Home and Warner Bros‚Äô The Matrix Resurrections .

title: La conservatrice C√©cile Debray nomm√©e √† la t√™te du mus√©e Picasso
description: La conservatrice, qui dirigeait le mus√©e de l'Orangerie, succ√®de √† Laurent Le Bon, promu en juin √† la pr√©sidence du Centre Pompidou.
full_description: C√©cile Debray, qui dirigeait le mus√©e de l'Orangerie depuis 2017, a √©t√© nomm√©e √† la t√™te du mus√©e Picasso , a annonc√© lundi 25 octobre le minist√®re de la Culture . Cette nomination par le pr√©sident Emmanuel Macron, sur proposition de la ministre de la Culture Roselyne Bachelot, a √©t√© annonc√©e le jour du 140e anniversaire de la naissance de l'artiste espagnol. C√©cile Debray succ√®de √† Laurent Le Bon , promu en juin dernier √† la pr√©sidence du Centre Pompidou. title: Kareena Kapoor makes a stylish statement as she heads to airport with Saif and sons Taimur, Jeh Ali Khan. See photos
full_description: Kareena Kapoor Khan on Tuesday was clicked heading to Kalina airport along with husband Saif Ali Khan and their two sons, Taimur and Jeh Ali Khan . Kareena turned heads in her yellow caption Gucci t-shirt, while Saif was dressed a little formally in a pair of white trousers and a blue t-shirt. Kareena opted for a more relaxed kind of airport look, complete with a cool set of sneakers and a pair of shades. Meanwhile, her younger son Jeh was seen with his nanny even as little Taimur made a fashion statement of his own. He was dressed in a blue top and blue jeans. She was seen posing for the camera before heading off to her own place. https://images.indianexpress.com/2020/08/1x1.png On the work front, Kareena Kapoor Khan is looking forward to the release of Aamir Khan ‚Äôs Laal Singh Chaddha. The film is an official remake of Tom Hanks‚Äô blockbuster Forrest Gump. The feature also has Mona Singh and Naga Chaitanya playing pivotal roles. Laal Singh Chaddha is helmed by Advait Chandan and is slated to release on Valentine‚Äôs Day next year. Apart from this, Kareena will also be seen in a Sujoy Ghosh movie. The superstar is also producing a movie with Ekta Kapoor for filmmaker Hansal Mehta.

title: Vijay pays full entry tax for Rolls Royce Ghost, now wants judge‚Äôs critical remarks expunged
full_description: Tamil movie star Vijay has moved the Madras High Court seeking to expunge all critical remarks made by Justice SM Subramaniam against him while hearing his earlier petition for entry tax relief on his luxurious Rolls Royce Ghost. Senior advocate Vijay Narayan, who appeared on behalf of Vijay, informed the court that the actor has paid the full entry tax of over Rs 32 lakh for his car in August. He later requested the two-judge bench to expunge the harsh comments made against Vijay. Also Read | Suriya on Jai Bhim: It is important to know our past to have a beautiful future The advocate informed the court that the judge‚Äôs remarks had caused a lot of pain to Vijay, besides painting him like a criminal before the public. The court has reserved the order on the petition for a later date. https://images.indianexpress.com/2020/08/1x1.png In July, the bench headed by Justice Subramaniam took exception to Vijay‚Äôs request to exempt him from entry tax for his car, which he had imported from England in 2012. Vijay sought the court‚Äôs assistance against the ‚Äúextraordinary entry tax‚Äù imposed on his vehicle, despite having paid the import duty as per the Customs Act during the time of purchase. Justice SM Subramaniam had described the prayer for tax relief as an ‚Äúanti-national habit‚Äù and dismissed his petition. ‚ÄúThese Actors are portraying themselves as champion to bring the social justice in the society. Their pictures are against corrupt activities in the society. But, they are evading tax and acting in a manner, which is not in consonance with the provisions of the Statutes,‚Äù read the order issued by Justice Subramaniam. The court had also imposed a fine of Rs 1 lakh, which will go to the Chief Minister‚Äôs Fund marked for Covid-19 relief work. Vijay later approached a division bench in the Madras High Court. The division bench had stayed the judgement issued by Justice Subramaniam. The court had also granted the actor permission to appeal against Justice Subramaniam‚Äôs order and expunge his scathing remarks against him. On the work front, Vijay, who was last seen in Master, is now busy shooting for Beast .

BackGridDan looked cool in his blue hoodie on a dance break with Nad[/caption] BackGridNadiya looked glam in her dress and boots as she smiled at Dan[/caption] Dan, 44, looked dapper in a navy bomber jacket and matched it with dark blue trousers. He dressed down his look with a pair of white trainers. Nadiya showed off her trim figure in a baggy grey jumper dress. She flashed some leg by ditching her tights and matched her dress with over the knee boots. The pro dancer wore a thick black winter jumper over her outfit as the duo took a break from gruelling dance rehearsals to grab a bite. title: Udienza Assange, Amnesty ‚Äúannullare le accuse, no all‚Äôestradizione, s√¨ alla scarcerazione
creator: Amnesty International
description: Alla vigilia dell‚Äôudienza contro la decisione di un tribunale del Regno Unito di non estradare Julian Assange negli Usa, la segretaria generale di Amnesty International Agn√®s Callamard ha chiesto alle autorit√† statunitensi di annullare le accuse nei confronti dell‚Äôimputato e alle autorit√† britanniche di‚Ä¶ Amnesty International
full_description: Alla vigilia dell‚Äôudienza contro la decisione di un tribunale del Regno Unito di non estradare Julian Assange negli Usa, la segretaria generale di Amnesty International Agn√®s Callamard ha chiesto alle autorit√† statunitensi di annullare le accuse nei confronti dell‚Äôimputato e alle autorit√† britanniche di non estradarlo e scarcerarlo immediatamente. Callamard ha reiterato queste richieste dopo che un‚Äôindagine di Yahoo News ha rivelato che i servizi statunitensi avevano valutato di rapire o uccidere Assange mentre si trovava all‚Äôinterno dell‚Äôambasciata dell‚ÄôEcuador di Londra. Queste rivelazioni indeboliscono ancora di pi√π le gi√† inaffidabili assicurazioni diplomatiche fornite dagli Usa che, se estradato, Assange non sarebbe posto in condizioni equivalenti a maltrattamento. ‚ÄúLe assicurazioni che il governo Usa non porrebbe Assange in una prigione di massima sicurezza n√© lo sottoporrebbe alle Misure amministrative speciali, sono state contraddette dall‚Äôammissione, sempre da parte degli Usa, che queste garanzie potrebbero venir meno. Il fatto che la Cia abbia preso in considerazione di rapire o uccidere Assange solleva ancora maggiori dubbi sulla credibilit√† delle promesse statunitensi e mette ulteriormente in evidenza le motivazioni politiche che si celano dietro questa vicenda‚Äù , ha dichiarato Callamard. ‚ÄúA quasi 20 anni di distanza, nessuna delle persone sospettate di crimini di guerra commessi dagli Usa nelle guerre dell‚ÄôAfghanistan e dell‚ÄôIraq √® stata incriminata n√© tantomeno condannata, mentre colui che ha rivelato tali crimini rischia di trascorrere il resto della sua vita in carcere‚Äù , ha aggiunto Callamard. L‚Äôudienza del 27 e del 28 ottobre dovr√† esaminare le cinque motivazioni su cui si basa l‚Äôappello presentato dagli Usa contro la decisione presa a gennaio da una corte di grado inferiore di non estradare Assange. Soprattutto, dovr√† giudicare la credibilit√† delle assicurazioni fornite dagli Usa circa il trattamento di Assange, che Amnesty International giudica inaffidabili. Gli Usa accusano Assange di aver cospirato, insieme all‚Äôanalista delle forze armate Chelsea Manning, per ottenere illegalmente informazioni riservate. Ai sensi dell‚ÄôAtto sullo spionaggio e dell‚ÄôAtto sulle frodi informatiche, rischia fino a 175 anni di carcere. L‚Äôincriminazione di Assange costituisce una grave minaccia per la libert√† di stampa, tanto negli Usa quanto altrove. Assange ha svolto attivit√† professionali proprie dell‚Äôesperienza quotidiana del giornalismo investigativo. L‚Äôeventuale estradizione di Assange criminalizzerebbe comuni prassi giornalistiche e permetterebbe a quello degli Usa e ad altri governi di prendere di mira giornalisti e scrittori al di fuori delle loro giurisdizioni per aver denunciato le loro malefatte. ‚ÄúL‚Äôincessante caccia ad Assange da parte del governo degli Usa √® evidentemente una misura punitiva ma in gioco non √® solo la sorte di una persona: in pericolo sono la libert√† di stampa e la libert√† d‚Äôespressione. Il giornalismo e l‚Äôeditoria d‚Äôinvestigazione sono di fondamentale importanza per tenere sotto controllo e denunciare l‚Äôoperato dei governi e chiamare a rispondere chi viola i diritti umani. Per questo, l‚Äôappello degli Usa va respinto, le accuse devono essere annullate e Assange dev‚Äôessere scarcerato‚Äù , ha concluso Callamard.

title: Jimmy Butler Has Officially Joined the $400+ Million Business of Selling Coffee, Starting With a $100,000 ‚ÄòMobile Lab‚Äô
creator: Christina Nunn
description: Jimmy Butler used his downtime during the pandemic to build a business around coffee and develop plans for a full-scale operation.
content: Jimmy Butler is a star forward for the Miami Heat. The talented athlete got his start in college before entering the NBA in the 2011 draft. Over the past few years, Butler has won many awards, including being a four-time All-NBA Team honoree and a five-time NBA All-Defensive Team honoree. These days, Butler is still focused on his game, but he‚Äôs expanded his hobbies to include a passion for coffee. In fact, the 32-year-old used his downtime during the coronavirus pandemic to build a business around coffee. He‚Äôs working on his coffee-making skills and developing plans for a full-scale operation.¬† When did Jimmy Butler become interested in coffee? The Miami Heat‚Äôs Jimmy Butler warms up | Michael Reaves/Getty Images The pandemic forced a lot of NBA players to get creative if they didn‚Äôt want to get extremely bored. During the NBA bubble, Butler decided to leverage a life-long interest into a new, marketable skill. In mid-2020, as the Miami Heat stayed in a Disney resort ‚Äúbubble,‚Äù Butler decided to open his own ‚Äúcoffee shop‚Äù in his hotel room.¬† Butler didn‚Äôt hesitate to upcharge his coffee either, asking for up to $20 a cup for the gourmet drinks. ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt get coffee nowhere here,‚Äù Butler said at the time. ‚ÄúSo I might bump it up to 30 bucks a cup. Just depends. People here can afford it. So ain‚Äôt nobody complaining.‚Äù After Butler and his teammates were released from the bubble, he decided to pursue his new venture. The NBA star trademarked a logo and gave his business a name: Big Face Coffee.¬† Jimmy Butler is serious about building a coffee community #NationalCoffeeDay pic.twitter.com/1LlH22Exhw‚Äî Jimmy Butler (@JimmyButler) September 29, 2020 If Butler is hoping for additional income, he could do worse than a coffee business. According to Statista, revenue in the coffee segment amounts to $409,895 million in 2021, with the market is expected to grow annually by 6.99%. For Butler, however, much of his new venture is a labor of love. As he admitted in a recent interview, he‚Äôs focused on the community he‚Äôs building ‚Äî full of people who love the simple joy of drinking coffee. As reported by Shopify Plus, Butler said he‚Äôs heard ‚Äúgreat things‚Äù from people about the project. ‚ÄúEverybody is so excited to see what the BIGFACE brand is. Not just coffee, but what the brand has to offer when you‚Äôre talking about coffee,‚Äù he explained. For now, Butler is working on the digital component of Big Face Coffee. He launched a new website before mapping out the necessary steps to open a chain of brick-and-mortar coffee shops. As Butler admitted, basketball is currently his ‚Äúmain thing‚Äù and he wants ‚Äúto be able to be all in. If I open up a coffee shop, I really want to make coffee.‚Äù Fans can buy Jimmy Butler‚Äôs coffee merch online Nothing better than sipping some Big Face Coffee with the squad @Uninterrupted x @Toyota #Sienna #ad pic.twitter.com/xI5XtNIOOP‚Äî Jimmy Butler (@JimmyButler) April 13, 2021 Fans who want to experience Big Face Coffee should be prepared to drop some serious cash. On the Big Face Brand website, fans can choose from a selection of products. The ‚ÄúCoffee NFT Box‚Äù features four coffee varieties and limited-edition artwork, priced at $500. For a more affordable option, you can snag a Big Face Brand hoodie for $120. The cheapest item on the website is a branded mug for $30. At the far end of the spectrum is a $100,000 mobile espresso station that includes all four bean varieties, a mini grinder, electric kettle, exclusive merchandise, and a glass Chemex. The mobile lab is certainly a luxurious way for fans to experience Butler‚Äôs bespoke coffee experience. title: Schlagerbooom 2021: Playback-Horror und miese Cover! Blankes Entsetzen nach Silbereisen-Show
creator: news.de-Redakteur Tobias R√ºster
description: Mit "Schlagerbooom" wollte Florian Silbereisen endlich wieder eine Volle-H√ºtte-Party im TV pr√§sentieren. Bei manchem TV-Zuschauer war stattdessen eher "Schlagerb√§√§√§h" angesagt. Dank peinlicher Playback-Panne und mieser Song-Auswahl.
full_description: Klingeln Ihnen auch noch die Ohren von "Schlagerbooom", der Show im Ersten mit Florian Silbereisen , in der am Samstagabend so ziemlich alle K√ºnstlerinnen und K√ºnstler zu sehen und h√∂ren war, die hierzulande den Vermerk "Schlagers√§ngerin" oder "Schlagers√§nger" im K√ºnstlerausweis stehen haben? Dagegen wirkte die neue Giovanni-Zarrella-Show im ZDF , mit der das Zweite im vergangenen Monat an den Start gegangen war und Silbereisen endlich Paroli bieten wollte, glatt wie die Er√∂ffnung eines Baumarktes in der brandenburgischen Provinz. Lesen Sie auch: Schock bei Florian Silbereisen! ER ist l√§ngst verheiratet und l√§sst jetzt die Baby-Bombe platzen Ausgelassene 2G-Stimmung in der Dortmunder Westfalenhalle, Florian Silbereisen, der noch aufgedrehter als √ºblich wirkte und nicht m√ºde wurde zu betonen, wie sehr allen K√ºnstlern das Publikum gefehlt habe und eine Bandbreite an Stars, die an ein gigantisches Schlager-Klassentreffen erinnerte. Von DJ √ñtzi √ºber Bernhard Brink und Roland Kaiser sowie J√ºrgen Drews bis zu Helmut Lotti, Michelle, LaFee, Ross Antony, David Garrett, Thomas Anders, Matthias Reim und Christin Stark. Von Otto Waalkes, B√ºlent Ceylan, Dieter Hallervorden und Hape Kerkeling bis zu Ramon Roselly, Ben Zucker und Beatrice Egli. Da bleiben doch keine W√ºnsche offen, oder? Es ist wie so oft im Leben: Kann sein, muss aber nicht. Denn w√§hrend sich Florian Silbereisen und seine G√§ste (der vermeintlich zu vermissende Rest hatte sich bekanntlich auf die Zarrella-Seite geschlagen) wie zur besten Vor-Corona-Zeit beim "Schlagerbooom" an sich selbst berauschen und sich in Party-Ekstase klatschen und schreien, flippen die TV-Zuschauer teilweise regelrecht aus. Allerdings aus anderem Grund. Beim Kurznachrichtendienst Twitter geht so manche Bombe in Form eines Tweets hoch. Ob das mit dem "Schlagerbooom" so gemeint war? Wohl eher nicht. Doch besonders eine Tatsache scheint die Menschen so richtig auf die Palme zu bringen. Vom 2G-Kuschel-Bussel-Abtanz-Alarm einmal ganz abgesehen, ist es vor allem die bisweilen miese Playback-Darbietung der K√ºnstler, die die Twitter-Nutzer verzweifeln l√§sst. Davon bleibt auch Florian Silbereisen nicht verschont: "Playback, Texte zum Ablesen und vorgefertigte Banner f√ºr die Zuschauer in der Halle, das ist der #schlagerboom. Dazu noch ein #2G-Superspreader-Event.", "ARD inszeniert heute Jugendlichkeit in einer Art Mini-Playback-Show. Pr√§sentiert wird das peinlich √ºberinszenierte Lippenbewegen von einem 40-j√§hrigen, der selbst auf dem Kongress der Kindermoderatoren als peinlich anbiedernd auffallen w√ºrde." Das Playback kann dann schon zu peinlichen Aussetzern f√ºhren, doch auch daf√ºr haben die Twitter-Nutzer einen Hinweis: "Tipp: Immer 3 Sekunden warten nach Playback-Ende, bis das Mikro wieder angeschaltet ist. #Schlagerbooom", l√§sst ein Zuschauer wissen. "#Schlagerbooom Die K√ºnstler treten alle auf nach dem Motto: Playback gegen Payback ‚Ç¨‚Ç¨‚Ç¨‚Ç¨", hei√üt es an anderer Stelle. Vielleicht ist es doch so einfach. Vielleicht h√§tte der eine oder andere Zuschauer √ºber dieses bekannte Dilemma noch hinweggesehen. W√§re da nicht die Songauswahl gewesen, mit der die Mehrheit der K√ºnstlerinnen und K√ºnstler sich beim "Schlagerbooom" pr√§sentierte. Ein Tweet mit der Frage: "H√§ ist das heute #Schlagerboom - wir covern EDITION?", bringt es da schon genau auf den Punkt. Eine durchaus gef√§hrliche Situation, wenn man es als Silbereisen-Zuschauer falsch angeht: "F√ºr jedes Cover einen Kurzen. Bin seit 30 Minuten blau. #Schlagerbooom", hei√üt es in einem Tweet, der das Ausma√ü der Cover-Songs zum Ausdruck bringen soll. Selbst die ganz Gro√üen lassen davon nicht die Finger: "Jetzt singt Roland auch noch n Cover - in englisch. Das ist nicht mehr mein Schlagerboom. Und auch Elvis w√§re dagegen!", w√ºtet ein Fan im Netz. Mit diesem Gef√ºhl ist er nicht alleine: "Lauter Covers heute! Schrecklich! Die finden nix mehr Neues anscheinend! Zeigefinger nach oben Frau Cher fallen eben alle 124 k√ºnstlichen Teile aus dem Gesicht!", "Ich m√∂chte keine schlechten cover mehr h√∂ren Laut schreiendes Gesicht gebt mir doch bitte einfach Wolfgang Petry" und "Marianne Rosenberg in der gleichen Z-Veranstaltung ‚ÄûSchlagerbooom" mit einem Cover von ‚ÄûDon't leave me this way". Sind alle deutschen Schlagerkomponisten an Corona gestorben?", lauten einige w√ºtende Kommentare zu Silbereisen-Show. Da erscheint eine Baumarkt-Er√∂ffnung in Brandenburg gleich in ganz neuem Licht, oder? Folgen Sie News.de schon bei Facebook und YouTube ? Hier finden Sie brandhei√üe News, aktuelle Videos, tolle Gewinnspiele und den direkten Draht zur Redaktion. rut/news.de

title: Director James Gunn Reveals His Frustrations About the Alec Baldwin ‚ÄòRust‚Äô Set Tragedy: ‚ÄòPeople Weren‚Äôt Following Safety Protocols‚Äô
creator: Andrew Addessi
description: ‚ÄúI say all of this as a reminder to myself as I am about to start production, as well as to everyone else involved in making films,‚Äù
content: The accident on the set of Rust with Alec Baldwin has affected many celebrities and workers in the film industry, including director James Gunn. He reflected on the event and responses. He expressed his frustrations of Hollywood favoring a ‚Äòtime is money‚Äô attitude rather than the safety of those on set. James Gunn | Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic James Gunn responded to the Alec Baldwin ‚ÄòRust‚Äô Set Tragedy Several people responded to the events on the Rust set. However, Gunn has experience in the area as a director. One fan suggested that the ban of real guns from movie sets altogether. ‚ÄúThe problem is numerous people have died or been grievously injured on film sets in the past couple decades. Almost none of them have been around firearms, but most of them have been because people weren‚Äôt following safety protocols,‚Äù Gunn tweeted. The problem is numerous people have died or been grievously injured on film sets in the past couple decades. Almost none of them have been around firearms, but most of them have been because people weren‚Äôt following safety protocols. https://t.co/afc0GxlxiJ‚Äî James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 23, 2021 The Guardians of the Galaxy director often deals with dangerous equipment on set. Whether on the Alec Baldwin set or any other film, James Gunn emphasized the importance of safety. ‚ÄúWhether working with automobiles, ratchet-pulls, helicopters, drones, forklifts, firearms, or anything even slightly dangerous, producers, directors, heads of department, and all the crew need to make sure all rules are being followed and qualified individuals are involved,‚Äù Gunn said. James Gunn cites a culture of ‚Äòrushing and fear‚Äô that led to the accident with Alec Baldwin on the ‚ÄòRust‚Äô set The main concern Gunn cites is Hollywood rushing or skipping safety procedures to make deadlines or keep a schedule. ‚ÄúA culture of constant rushing and fear, which is what so many Hollywood sets are today, doesn‚Äôt make movies any better, it doesn‚Äôt save money because of all the resultant mistakes, and it certainly doesn‚Äôt take into account our well-being, physically or mentally,‚Äù Gunn said The Suicide Squad director included himself in the conversation. As a director, he wants to make sure everyone on set remains as safe as possible. James Gunn wants to prevent anything like the Alec Baldwin Rust set tragedy. The discussion around on-set firearms is valuable. But my fear is it‚Äôs now obscuring discussing the many ways dozens have died or been grievously injured on movie sets because of irresponsibility, ignoring safety protocols, improper leadership & a set culture of mindless rushing. https://t.co/yaz6P824AS‚Äî James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 25, 2021 ‚ÄúBeing present to our work, being cognizant of our co-workers‚Äô health, and following the rules of safety on set may not eradicate all injury and death,‚Äù Gunn noted. freak accidents do happen in all workplaces. But it will certainly prevent the vast majority of tragedies.‚Äù While Gunn‚Äôs sets usually use more fantastical prop weapons, like Bloodsport‚Äôs attachments, he still takes as much care as possible. Gunn addressed all dangers on film sets The tragedy with Alec Baldwin on the Rust set made James Gunn evaluate safety on set. Like he said in his tweet, the issue at hand includes more than firearms on movie sets. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm addressing‚Ä¶what‚Äôs being framed as ‚Äòthis specific problem‚Äô by so many on Twitter. Many see it as firearms on set, but I see it as a culture of non-compliance and rushing,‚Äô Gunn said. ‚ÄúWhich has resulted in many deaths and horrifying injuries over the past 25 years.‚Äù Even though many fans know Gunn for his sci-fi films, he remains diligent. My greatest fear is that someone will be fatally hurt on one of my sets. I pray this will never happen. My heart goes out to all of those affected by the tragedy today on Rust, especially Halyna Hutchins & her family.‚Äî James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 22, 2021 ‚ÄúI say all of this as a reminder to myself as I am about to start production, as well as to everyone else involved in making films,‚Äù Gunn added. While his upcoming DC show Peacemaker films, he intends to practice safety in all aspects of the filmmaking process. James Gunn plans to avoid anything like the accident on the Alec Baldwin Rust set. title: Paris Fury reveals daughter was ‚Äòdying in her arms‚Äô during traumatic birth
creator: Lisa McLoughlin
description: PARIS Fury has recalled the horrifying moment her daughter Athena was ‚Äúdying in her arms‚Äù following her traumatic birth. The 31-year-old welcomed the little one in August with her boxing star husband Tyson, 33. The mother-of-six revealed that the two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat of 300 beats a minute, the norm is around the [‚Ä¶]
content: PARIS Fury has recalled the horrifying moment her daughter Athena was ‚Äúdying in her arms‚Äù following her traumatic birth. The 31-year-old welcomed the little one in August with her boxing star husband Tyson, 33. Paris Fury recalled the moment her daughter Athena stopped breathing. Pictured with husband Tyson The two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat and was rushed to the NICU The mother-of-six revealed that the two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat of 300 beats a minute, the norm is around the 120 beats mark. Paris said medics tried to slow Athena‚Äôs heartbeat down but the Loose Women panelist said it caused ‚Äúa load of other complications‚Äù and she was transferred from the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to Alder Hey Children‚Äôs Hospital. The Fury family then endured a nightmare two weeks when the little one was placed into a neo-natal intensive care unit [NICU]. Speaking to OK! magazine, she explained: ‚ÄúWe went over there and they sedated her and put her on an incubation, where they put a tube down her throat to breathe. ‚ÄúThey put her on tablets to slow her heart down and when they took her off the tube, they thought it was going to be normal. But I think the accumulation of sedatives, painkillers, beta blockers for her heart and everything was just too much.‚Äù Most read in Celebrity 'they took everything' Upset Molly-Mae & Tommy Fury robbed of ¬£800k as gang target home 'eyes opened' Strictly's Giovanni Pernice breaks silence on Maura Higgins split 'SHOCK & HEARTACHE' Alec Baldwin's wife breaks silence days after accidental shooting up & adam Adam Woodyatt seen after estranged wife's fury over his I'm A Celeb deal revealed HEARTLESS Steve Allen called Sarah Harding a 'needy, self-imposed alcoholic' before death HAPPY FAMILY Hazel O'Sullivan praises footie partner Andros Townsend for being hands-on-dad ‚ÄúShe was in my arms and she stopped breathing and became completely unresponsive. Her heart rate was fading away ‚Äì she was dying in my arms. ‚ÄúThey took her off me, put her on the table and resuscitated her. Tyson came running in. It was horrific. They managed to get her heart going and everything stabilised.‚Äù Paris and¬†Tyson¬†were finally able to¬†bring their sixth child home¬†on August 20 and the family of eight were reunited after a stressful ordeal. The heavyweight champ was full of praise for the staff at the Alder Hey Family House Trust in Liverpool, the hospital that looked after Athena.# Speaking on August 18, Tyson said: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just here feeding my little girl. Off the ICU, on the mend, should be going home soon. ‚ÄúThank you to God and thank you to all the doctors and nurses who have helped her.‚Äù Tyson has since set up a GoFundMe page for the hospital, raising nearly ¬£50,000 to date. Athena is their third daughter, following Venezuela, 11, and Valencia Amber, three. They also have three boys ‚Äì Prince John James, eight, Prince Tyson II, four, and two-year-old Prince Adonis Amaziah. Despite the family‚Äôs joy following the new arrival, the couple have also had to overcome heartbreak in recent years too. Paris met 6ft 9in Tyson they were 16 and 17 and got married in front of 300 guests in 2008. They have made no secret of their desire to have a big family, with Tyson recently¬†declaring they wanted 11¬†children ‚Äì enough for a ‚Äúmixed football team.‚Äù And while they‚Äôve been blessed with six children, it hasn‚Äôt always been easy for the couple. In 2014, they tragically lost a baby when Paris was six months pregnant, and she was forced to endure a stillbirth. The traumatic loss occurred at the same time Tyson‚Äôs uncle Hughie died. While Tyson managed to resume his career, just days before his comeback fight against Sefer Seferi in 2018, Paris tragically suffered another miscarriage. Fearing it would impact her husband in the ring, or have an effect on his mental health, she decided not to tell him until after the fight. Soon after the fight, Paris fell pregnant with son Tyson, who they welcomed three months prematurely. Now, the family are a stronger unit than ever before, with Tyson recently saying: ‚ÄúGot a beautiful wife, beautiful kids, they‚Äôre all healthy. That‚Äôs the most important thing, you know, your health and your family.‚Äù Tyson is proud of his roots in the travelling community and while he wants his children grow up with the same values, the boxer is keen to break tradition in some ways to provide what he believes is best for his kids. Despite Paris saying their children would likely leave school aged 11 and stay at home until they marry, Tyson has said: ‚ÄúI would be very, very proud if one of my children were to be the first [of the family] to graduate from university. ‚ÄúMaybe we could even have the first Dr Fury one day.‚Äù Paris and Tyson pictured on their wedding day The boxer pictured with his three sons (L-R): Prince Adonis Amaziah, Prince Tyson II and Prince John James We pay for your stories! Do you have a story for The Sun Showbiz team? Email digishowbiz@the-sun.co.uk or call us direct on 02077824220 . We pay for videos too. Click here to upload yours.

title: Satyameva Jayate 2 Trailer Out Now: Release Date, Cast and All You Need to Know
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
description: Satyameva Jayate 2 is a Bollywood movie directed by Milap Zaveri starring John Abraham. Know about the release date, cast and songs of the movie
content: Satyameva Jayate 2 is a much-awaited Hindi movie directed by Milap Zaveri with intense character and action in the movie. The movie is an Emmay Entertainment and T-series production. The trailer of the movie has been released on Monday, 25 October which has already gained much attention of the viewers. The story of the movie is all about raising a voice against the injustice prevailing in society and the misuse and exploitation of power. The first part of the movie Satyameva Jayate released in 2018 on Independence Day was a great success because of its story and vigilante action. Therefore fans are excited and eager to watch the second part as Satyameva Jayate 2 as it is going to hit theatres. RELEASE DATE: The release date of the upcoming movie Satyameva Jayate 2 is Thursday 25 November 2021. It was earlier decided to release on 26 November but postponed later so now it is releasing a day earlier than the scheduled date. Actor John Abraham took to Twitter to share information on the release date of the action drama Satyameva Jayate 2. He tweeted that Satyameva Jayate 2 is going to bring double the action and entertainment in cinemas on 25 November and the trailer is made available on 25 October. CAST OF SATYAMEVA JAYATE 2: The movie stars John Abraham as the lead character with triple roles which includes a father and twin sons with names of the characters as Vijay Singh Azaad, Satya Prakash Azaad and Jaideep "Jai" Azaad. Other cast includes known celebrities such as Divya Khosla Kumar playing the powerful role of Sita Rameshwasri, Anup Soni playing as an Inspector named Manish Zaveri, Harsh Chhaya appearing as Anupam Menaria and Rajeev Pillai. SONGS OF SATYAMEVA JAYATE 2: Some of the notable songs of the movie include the title track Satyameva Jayate and Dilduba. The songs of the movie are by Payal Dev, Rochak Kohli, Arko, Tanishk Bagchi and Jass Manak. WATCH SATYAMEVA JAYATE TRAILER: Also read: Prakash Jha's web series set attackedAlso watch:¬†

title: Rust cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was killed after Alec Baldwin rehearsed pointing gun at camera, affidavit reveals
description: An affidavit that provides new details into the circumstances of the shooting was released on October 24 in which the film‚Äôs director Joel Souza said that Rust cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was killed while Alec Baldwin was rehearsing a scene that involved the actor pointing a revolver in the direction of a camera lens. According to Variety, Souza, who was also injured in the on-set accident, said that the cast and crew had been assured that Baldwin was handling a ‚Äúcold gun,‚Äù meaning it had no live rounds. According to the safety protocols that need to be followed by the film‚Äôs armorer, Hannah Gutierrez-Reed and Rust assistant director Dave Halls were required to check and make sure that the barrel was empty by double-checking before the firearm was handed to the actors. When the incident took place, Souza and Hutchins were standing behind the camera to see the angle and Baldwin was sitting on a wooden pew facing south towards the camera and crew, outfitted in Western garb. Reid Russell, a cameraman who was standing next to the two, told police that he ‚Äúremembered Joel having blood on his person, and Ms. Hutchins speaking and saying she couldn‚Äôt feel her legs.‚Äù Souza told investigators that Hutchins grabbed her midsection, at which point he noticed he was bleeding from his shoulder. Hutchins was pronounced dead October 21 after being airlifted to an Albuquerque hospital. She was 42. The Rust production broke for lunch around 12:30 p.m. on Thursday. When the cast and crew returned back to the set after lunch, Souza said he was not sure if the firearm that Baldwin was using was checked again. Hutchins‚Äô death has prompted calls for greater safety measures on sets and inspired a petition on change.org to ban the use of real firearms on sets. That petition has drawn more than 25,000 signatories. The producers of the movie Rust announced on Sunday that they are suspending production while sheriffs investigate Hutchins‚Äô death. title: ‚ÄûDer Teddy‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú: Ist er schon enttarnt? Fans haben Verdacht

full_description: Endlich ist es wieder soweit und die Fans von ‚Äû The Masked Singer ‚Äú 2021 k√∂nnen wieder flei√üig mitraten, wer unter den bunten Kost√ºmen steckt. Einer der Unbekannten in diesem Jahr ist ‚Äû Der Teddy ‚Äú. Man muss zugeben, das putzige Kuscheltier ist augenscheinlich schon ein bisschen in die Jahre gekommen. Mit einigen Gebrauchsspuren am K√∂rper von ‚Äû Der Teddy ‚Äú steht der s√º√üe Pl√ºsch-Freund auf der B√ºhne. Sein Aussehen l√§sst darauf schlie√üen, dass er fr√ºher hei√ü und innig gebliebt wurde. Immerhin hat das niedliche ‚Äû The Masked Singer ‚Äú-Kost√ºm bereits das ein oder andere Loch ‚Äì Wolle quillt aus der Nase, aus dem Ohr, aus den Beinen. ‚ÄûDer Teddy‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú 2021: Wer steckt unter der s√º√üen Maske? Da bleibt nur zu hoffen, dass die 'Wunden' den Teddy nicht beim Singen st√∂ren, schlie√ülich m√∂chte sich das Stofftier mit Sicherheit bei Konkurrenten wie dem Mops oder Hammerhai gut schlagen und die Jury mit seinem Gesang beeindrucken. Doch wer k√∂nnte sich unter der niedlichen Teddy-Maske verstecken? Ein Name liegt da nat√ºrlich auf der Hand. ‚ÄûMuss ja ganz klar Teddy Teclebrhan sein‚Äú, schreibt ein Fan von ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú bei Instagram. Na, wenn das mal nicht zu einfach ist. ----------------------------- ‚ÄûDer Teddy‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú: Die Hinweise Wurde in der Waschmaschine mitgewaschen Ist verloren gegangen Musste im Fundb√ºro auf das Wiedersehen warten Hat sein eigenes Fundb√ºro er√∂ffnet ‚ÄûTeddys Fundgrube ‚Äì Hier macht das Wiedersehen Freude‚Äú Erinnert sich an Freunde aus Frankreich, die ihn immer wieder verloren und wiedergefunden haben H√§lt einen Fu√üball in den H√§nden Z√§hlen auf Franz√∂sisch bis drei -------------------------------- Gute Geschichten kann Teddy Teclebrhan mit Sicherheit erz√§hlen, das bewies er schon in der Amazon-Comedy ‚ÄûLol‚Äú. Aber ob er auch singen kann? ---------------------------------------- Das sind die Tipps der Fans: Lena Gercke Teddy Teclebrhan Julia Leischik Sarah Harrison ---------------------------------------- Nach dem ersten Auftritt haben die Fans aber eine ganz andere Vermutung: Julia Leischik soll unter dem pl√ºschigen Kost√ºm stecken. Die Hinweise w√§re nicht ganz unpassend: Die Blondine moderiert immerhin die Sendung ‚ÄûJulia Leischik sucht‚Äú, in der sie Menschen dabei hilft, vermisste Angeh√∂rige wiederzufinden. Die Vermutung, dass vielleicht Ex-‚ÄûBachelor‚Äú-Kandidatin und Influencerin Sarah Harrison unter der Maske stecken k√∂nnte, sorgt im Netz f√ºr reichlich Diskussion. Die Zweifach-Mama, die eigentlich mit ihrer Familie in Dubai lebt, befindet sich seit zwei Wochen in Deutschland. Vielleicht, um heimlich an der Verkleidungsshow teilzunehmen? ‚ÄûEs waren 2 Kinder zu sehen. So einen gro√üen Teddyb√§r haben sie auch zu Hause. Sie wusste vor kurzem nicht, wie lange sie in Deutschland bleibt‚Äú, fasst ein Fan zusammen. ----------------------------------------- Mehr zu den ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú-Kandidaten: ‚ÄûDer Mops‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú: Fans sicher ‚Äì ER steckt unter der Maske ‚ÄûDer Hammerhai bei The Masked Singer: Steckt ER unter der Maske? ‚ÄûDas Stinktier bei The Masked Singer: Haben die Fans IHN erkannt? ‚ÄûDie Heldin‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú: Fans tippen auf SIE ‚ÄûDas Axolotl‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú: Fan vermutet IHN unter der Maske ‚ÄûDer Ph√∂nix‚Äú bei ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äú 2021: Fans sind sich sicher ‚Äì ‚ÄûKein Zweifel‚Äú --------------------------------------- Eins der ‚ÄûThe Masked Singer‚Äù-Kost√ºme tritt in diesem Jahr au√üer Konkurrenz an. title: The Witcher 2, la nuova immagine di Henry Cavill nei panni di Geralt esalta i fan [FOTO]
creator: Cristiano Bolla
description: Lo Strigo √® pronto a tornare su Netflix dal 17 dicembre
content: Conto alla rovescia per l‚Äôuscita della seconda stagione di The Witcher, la serie basata sull‚Äôomonima saga letteraria e videoludica che ha per protagonista Henry Cavill. Geralt of Rivia torner√† su Netflix il 17 dicembre ed √® stata diffusa una nuova immagine in grado di alzare nuovamente l‚Äôhype dei fan in attesa. A condividerla √® Empire, che dedica un articolo al cacciatore di mostri le cui imprese continueranno ad essere esplorate nella seconda stagione. Nello scatto, vediamo proprio lo Strigo Geralt in posa da combattimento in quella che sembra essere Kaer Morhen. Il pallore e il contorno scuro degli occhi inoltre fanno pensare che sia sotto l‚Äôeffetto di qualche pozione, un tratto comune sia ai libri di Andrzej Sapkowski che ai videogiochi della CD PROJEKT RED.¬† QUI POTETE VEDERE LA FOTO DI THE WITCHER 2 Dai nuovi episodi, i fan possono aspettarsi finalmente l‚Äôincontro tra Geralt e Ciri, solo sfiorato al termine della prima stagione: le loro due storie correvano su linee temporali diverse, ma proprio sul finale i loro destini si sono incrociati.¬† Durante il TUDUM Netflix di poche settimane fa, sono state mostrate alcune clip esclusive della serie in cui si vedono appunto i due grandi e attesi protagonisti. Per i fan dell‚Äôuniverso del cacciatore di mostri, √® gi√† disponibile sulla piattaforma lo spin-off animato Nightmare of the Wolf (QUI la nostra recensione) che esplora le origini di Vesemir, il mentore di Geralt e nuovo personaggio di The Witcher 2. Di seguito la sinossi ufficiale della seconda stagione: The Witcher, serie fantasy basata sull‚Äôomonima saga bestseller, √® il racconto epico di una famiglia e del suo destino. La storia dei destini intrecciati di tre individui nel vasto mondo de Il Continente, dove umani, elfi, witcher, gnomi e mostri combattono per sopravvivere e dove il bene e il male non sono facilmente identificabili.¬†Nella seconda stagione, convinto che Yennefer sia morta nell‚Äôepica battaglia di Colle Sodden, Geralt di Rivia porta Ciri nel luogo pi√π sicuro che conosce, la sua casa d‚Äôinfanzia, Kaer Morhen. Mentre i re, gli elfi, gli umani e i demoni del Continente lottano per la supremazia fuori dalle sue mura, Geralt di Rivia deve proteggere la ragazza da qualcosa di molto pi√π pericoloso: il misterioso potere dentro di s√©. Nel ricco cast dello show troviamo: Henry Cavill (Geralt di Rivia), Anya Chalotra (Yennefer), Freya Allan (Ciri), Jodhi May (Calanthe), Kim Bodnia (Vesemir), Bj√∂rn Hlynur Haraldsson (Eist), Adam Levy (Mousesack), MyAnna Buring (Tissaia), Mimi Ndiweni (Fringilla), Therica Wilson-Read (Sabrina), Emma Appleton (Renfri), Eamon Farren (Cahir), Joey Batey (Jaskier), Lars Mikkelsen (Stregobor), Royce Pierreson (Istredd), Maciej Musia≈Ç (Sir Lazlo), Wilson Radjou-Pujalte (Dara) e Anna Shaffer (Triss). title: Sooryavanshi song Mera Yaaraa: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif weave magic in Arijit Singh's romantic melody
description: The excitement for Rohit Shetty directorial Sooryavanshi has been there ever since its inception. The film which was supposed to release last year got postsponed because of the coronavirus pandemic. Well now, the Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Ranveer Singh and Ajay Devgn starrer¬†is all set to release in the theatres on the occasion of Diwali ie November 5. While everyone is waiting for the big day, the makers have been increasing the excitement levels by sharing various songs and BTS videos. And yet again, the announcement of another one made our day special. Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the lead jodi shared the teaser of their romantic song 'Mera Yaaraa' which has been crooned by none other than Arijit Singh.
full_description: The excitement for directorial Sooryavanshi has been there ever since its inception. The film which was supposed to release last year got postsponed because of the coronavirus pandemic. Well now, the , , and Ajay Devgn starrer is all set to release in the theatres on the occasion of Diwali ie November 5. While everyone is waiting for the big day, the makers have been increasing the excitement levels by sharing various songs and BTS videos. And yet again, the announcement of another one made our day special. Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the lead jodi shared the teaser of their romantic song 'Mera Yaaraa' which has been crooned by none other than Arijit Singh. Akshay and Katrina in the track can be seen enjoying romantic time in the green fields and the boats on a beach. The highlight of the song remained the momet when Akshay goes down on his knees and proposes Katrina with a ring in a dreamy setting. Sharing the glimpse of the same, the Bollywood actor wrote, "When her one smile makes you smile‚Ä¶let's cherish the romance with #MereYaaraa, song out tomorrow.... Come #BackToCinemas with #Sooryavanshi on 5th November. @arijitsingh @neetimohan18." While for Katrina, she wrote in the caption, "#merayaara SONG OUT TOMORROW with the beautiful voices of @arijitsingh @neetimohan18 #sooryavanshi #backtocinema." 'Sooryavanshi' is a continuation of the cop action 'Singham' universe, which began with the Ajay Devgn starrer 'Singam' and 'Singham Returns', then expanded with 'Simmba', starring Ranveer Singh and Devgn, and now is going forward with Akshay's character. The makers, a few days back released the first song 'Aila Re Aillaa' which left everyone impressed. See it here: Just recently, Katrina shared a hilarious behind-the-scenes video from the first promotions. Taking to her Instagram handle, Katrina shared a video in which she could be sarcastically seen saying, "So guys, this is the first day of promotions for Sooryavanshi, and I have never seen Rohit sir and Akshay so excited, they are ready to go, they are full of energy, they are like," and turns the camera to capture Rohit and Akshay resting. The moment both of them realise that they are being captured by Katrina, they ask her to stop. "Don't record," Rohit could be heard telling Katrina. "Arre but you wake up at 5 in the morning, you must be tired," Katrina teases Akshay, who asks her, "What are you doing? We have a reputation," and both Akshay and Rohit run away from Katrina in a hurry. In 'Sooryavanshi' Akshay will be seen portraying the role of a DSP who fights crime. Katrina will be playing the role of Akshay's love interest in the film. Don't forget to watch the trailer here:

title: Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights
creator: Vyas
description: The episode started with the housemates dancing to the 'Chitti Aayire' song. Ravi is seen talking about how Lobo made such statements in the confession room.
content: Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights The episode started with the housemates dancing to the 'Chitti Aayire' song. Ravi is seen talking about how Lobo made such statements in the confession room. Lobo cried and apologized to Ravi. Later, Lobo also apologized to Anne. Bigg Boss starts the nominations task. The postman brings two letters and only one can get the letter. The 2 people who got the letters have to convince each other. The person who won't get the letter will go into nominations. Maanas and Sreeram bring the letters and dump them in the garden area. Lobo and Priyanka's letters come first. Lobo accepts to give Priyanka's letter. Lobo's letter goes into the shredder and he cried. Priyanka reads out the letter and became emotional. Ravi picks Siri and Viswa's letters. Viswa asks her to give him the letter as he didn't even get the letter from his kid before. Siri accepted to give him the letter as she also knows how it would be to have a kid and not know his whereabouts. Siri reads the letter for Viswa. Anne and Maanas get the letter. Maanas gives it up and Anne thanked him and reads the letter. Priyanka gets emotional too. Lobo and Viswa pick Sreeram and Ravi's letters. Sreeram wanted to give it up to Ravi. But, Lobo stops him and tries to convince Ravi by saying that Ravi has already got a letter, a video, and also a doll but Sreeram got nothing. Ravi accepts and gives the letter to Sreeram who reads and becomes happy. Shannu and Kajal get the letters. Shannu initially claimed that his mother survived cancer and he wanted to know how she is doing but gives it up for Kajal. Shannu said that his mother is his inspiration. He said that she survived cancer and so many struggles in life and he can survive it too. Sunny as a captain gets power. He can directly pick a saved contestant to go into nomination and keep their letter into a shredder to give Jessie the letter from his family. Sunny leaves the decision with the saved contestants. Sreeram brings his letter and claimed that he is fine with it. Ravi comes up and claims that Shannu, Siri, and Jessie should clear the vacuum with Sreeram now. Siri said that it is not right to bring it up in this situation. Sreeram, Shannu says that they are okay with whatever is there in between them. Sunny also said that it is not right. Jessie reads the letter from his mother. Bigg Boss announced that Lobo, Siri, Shannu, Maanas, Ravi, and Sreeram are in nominations. Bigg Boss added that he also got the letter from his family and he will get it unconditionally as he is the captain. Sunny reads the letter from his mother and feels happy.

full_description: MBC‚Äôs upcoming drama ‚Äú The Red Sleeve Cuff ‚Äù has shared a sneak peek of the bromance between between 2PM‚Äôs Junho , Kang Hoon , and Oh Dae Hwan. Based on a novel, ‚ÄúThe Red Sleeve Cuff‚Äù is a traditional historical drama that tells the record of an imperial court romance between court lady Seong Deok Im ( Lee Se Young ), who wanted to protect the life she had chosen, and emperor Yi San (Junho), who put the nation first before love. Not only does the drama boast of a timeless love between Seong Deok Im and Yi San, but it also includes the loyal friendship between Yi San, Hong Deok Ro (Kang Hoon), and Kang Tae Ho (Oh Dae Hwan). Hong Deok Ro is a government official whose goal is to make sure Yi San wins the throne, and Kang Tae Ho is Yi San‚Äôs faithful bodyguard. The newly released stills give a glimpse of Yi San‚Äôs relationship with the two characters who help him on his path to becoming the next king. In one photo, Yi San strides forward with confidence as he exudes authoritative vibes. Beside him are Hong Deok Ro and Kang Tae Ho, piquing anticipation for the charismatic performance of the ‚ÄúYi San Crew.‚Äù Another photo shows the Yi San and Hong Deok Ro standing next to each other as they make the darkened palace shine with their good looks. The atmosphere is calm and comfortable, hinting that the two go beyond mere political relations. In the next still, Yi San and Kang Tae Ho seem to be preparing for battle. The two move with resolve and grace, and their expressions are both solemn and tense. It is expected that Kang Tae Ho will be a sturdy and reliable guard who will protect Yi San until the very end. ‚ÄúThe Red Sleeve Cuff‚Äù premieres on November 12 at 10 p.m. KST and will be available on Viki. Check out a trailer below! Watch Now Source ( 1 )

title: Dans les th√©√¢tres, le mauvais spectacle de l‚Äô√©galit√© femmes-hommes
